Trigger You fail but not critically fail either a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} against a mark you were hidden from or undetected by or an attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Create a Diversion} against a mark.

You keep yourself hidden and misdirect attention even when your actions don’t quite land, whether it’s taking advantage of a room’s acoustics or a passing crowd. Attempt a @Check[Deception|against:will] check against the Will DC of your target; on a success, you remain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to them depending on your state before the triggering action. On a critical success, you can Stride half your speed without your mark noticing. You might still become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Observed} to other creatures, but they need to take actions such as Point Out to make your target aware.
